mapper.select: SELECT EDU_NO ,EDU_TITLE ,EDU_DATE ,EDU_TIME ,EDU_ORGAN ,EDU_CHECK ,EDU_PERSON ,EDU_PHONE ,EDU_CONTENT ,EDU_FILENAME ,EDU_ADR FROM OFFLINEEDU WHERE EDU_NO = #{edu_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OFFLINEEDU (EDU_NO, EDU_TITLE, EDU_DATE, EDU_TIME, EDU_ORGAN, EDU_CHECK, EDU_PERSON, EDU_PHONE, EDU_CONTENT, EDU_FILENAME, EDU_ADR) VALUES ( ( select nvl(max(edu_no),0)+1 from offlineedu), #{edu_title}, #{edu_date}, #{edu_time}, #{edu_organ}, #{edu_check}, #{edu_person}, #{edu_phone}, #{edu_content}, #{edu_filename}, #{edu_adr} )
